placeholderEncoded: Here will be the encoded text %2F Put the encoded text here.
placeholderDecoded: Here will be the decoded text / Put the decoded text here.
toolsBase64Description: Translates a string into and from base64 encoding.
toolsUrlEncodingDescription: Translates a string into and from URL encoding.
toolsDocumentScannerDescription: Uses the camera to scan a document, morphs it to a rectangle and converts it into a PDF.
toolsFlashlightDescription: Uses the camera light as flashlight / torch.

errors.noPermissionGiven: Did not receive permission, to use the camera (and with it the flashlight function)!
errors.noPermissionGranted: Did not receive permission, to use the camera (and with it the flashlight function)!

general.explanation: I use a lot of online tools myself and thanks to ads and cookie banners, the experience is not really that great. So I thought I'm going to build a couple of tools myself whenever I have time and see what I can do. Maybe even have some webassembly tools like image converter or similar things. Tools that could be used offline as well. Let's see where this goes.
general.toolsIWantToBuild:
JWT extractor
Image converter
Video to GIF converter
general.stuffToDo: Things I may want to build:
general.noteAboutParaglide: Oh, and I'm going to try out this localisation that was added by sv create: ParaglideJS.
